FOOTER
This is my first attempt at responsive design. Responsive design is a powerful framework that must be a consideration for any web designer. An easy to read site on any device is a key component of user-first design. As a designer I would certainly be more confident about my website's future success and viewership prospects with a responsive design. Thank you for checking this out!
